intro: Wouldn't anyone be happy to have a girlfriend who makes them lunch and comes to pick them up every morning?
description:
I had a certain conviction.
If things continue like this, I'll go crazy.

Although I was able to start dating the new transfer student, Tsubomi Watanuki, 
her caring behavior gradually escalated.
Tracking eating habits, checking out my friends, smartphone apps, GPS...

Before I knew it, I was curling up in bed just thinking about her.
If we stay together like this, I'm going to go crazy from stress...

If only I could talk to someone.
But who can I confide in about this....



▼Characters
Tsubomi Watanuki 
A very cute transfer student that Tsukasa fell in love with at first sight and confessed his feelings to.
She likes to take care of others, but slowly her methods begin to escalate...

Yu Tatara
The attractive childhood friend who lives next door. 
She has been taking good care of Tsukasa since she was a child, and secretly has a crush on him.

Hinano Migushi
A friendly junior who does her best for the people she loves.
After being saved by Tsukasa when she was in trouble, she starts following him around like a pet.

Tsukasa Daidouji
A somewhat absent-minded, slightly awkward male student.
He fell in love at first sight with Tsubomi Watanuki in April, confessed his feelings and started dating, but...
